short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BlinkCRM - Get high quality leads, save time and money!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BlinkCRM helps you improve lead generation, email marketing, whatsapp marketing and telemarketing, say no to excel sheets, and directly put your lead in BlinkCRM for better business prospects. BlinkCRM allows you to manage your leads, campaigns, followups and more all at one place.

BlinkCRM chrome extension gives you more leverage of directly picking the data, assign a campaign and sending to BlinkCRM dashboard. 

BlinkCRM Dashboard gives you
1. Leads database management and Bulk uploads
2. API access and chrome extension to create leads
3. Email marketing automation
4. Unlimited emails sequences
5. Use your personal SMTP
6. Email tracking and opening rate
7. Email links click tracking
8. Start unlimited campaigns

Disclaimer: This extension is only for those users who are registered with https://blinkcrm.in
